description: This course involves practice and game observation and a practicum in coaching a sport. Students are involved in practice planning and drill work, game preparation, and administration, as well as game rules and coaching strategies. This course applies toward the coaching sequence only. Offered annually. Prerequisite: ESTH 238 and permission of instructor.
name: Coaching Practicum
prerequisites: Prerequisite: ESTH 238 and permission of instructor.
